item.title: 在挪威，2024 年售出的几乎所有新车都是全电动汽车
item.description: 周四的登记数据显示，挪威去年售出的十辆新车中有九辆仅由电池驱动，这使挪威有望实现到2025年仅增加电动汽车上路的目标。【原文：Nine out of ten new cars sold in Norway last year were powered by battery only, registration data showed on Thursday, placing the country within reach of its target of only adding cars that are electric on the road by 2025.】

item.title: 价格战进入第三年，中国电动汽车制造商延长购买优惠政策
item.description: 在全球最大汽车市场的价格战持续第三年之际，中国电动汽车制造商（包括尼奥和李汽车）紧随市场领导者特斯拉和比亚迪之后，将优惠政策延长至 2025 年初。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle makers including Nio and Li Auto have followed market leaders Tesla and BYD in extending buying incentives to the start of 2025, as a price war in the world's largest auto market continues for a third year.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国码头工人和港口雇主将于 1 月 7 日重启谈判
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引一位熟知内情的人士的话报道，由于罢工的威胁迫在眉睫，美国码头工人工会国际码头工人协会（International Longshoremen's Association）的领导人和代表其雇主的组织将于 1 月 7 日恢复合同谈判。【原文：Leaders from U.S. dockworkers' union the International Longshoremen’s Association and the group that represents their employers are set to resume contract talks on Jan. 7 as the threat of a strike looms, the Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达的市值在 2024 年因人工智能反弹而提升 2 万亿美元
item.description: 受人工智能热潮和各行各业对以人工智能为中心的芯片的强劲需求推动，Nvidia 成为 2024 年全球市值涨幅最大的公司。【原文：Nvidia emerged as the biggest global gainer in market capitalization for 2024, driven by surging interest in artificial intelligence and the robust demand for its AI-centric chips across various industries.】

item.title: 报告称 2024 年全球保险费率下降 0.9%，为 2017 年以来首次下降
item.description: 保险经纪公司豪顿（Howden）在周四的一份报告中称，随着市场竞争在多年费率上涨之后变得更加激烈，去年全球保险费下降了 0.9%。【原文：Global insurance premiums fell 0.9% last year as the market became more competitive after years of rate rises, insurance broker Howden said in a report on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国将28家美国实体列入出口管制名单
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，为 "维护国家安全和利益"，中国已将28家美国实体列入出口管制名单。【原文：China has added 28 U.S. entities to its export control list to "safeguard national security and interests", the commerce ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 波兰 12 月制造业采购经理人指数下降，但前景有所改善
item.description: 据 S&P Global 周四报道，波兰 12 月份制造业进一步下滑，采购经理人指数（PMI）从 11 月份的 48.9 降至 48.2，创下自 8 月份以来最严重的降幅。【原文：Poland's manufacturing sector saw a further decline in December, with the Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) dropping to 48.2 from 48.9 in November, marking the strongest deterioration since August, S&P Global reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 2024 年德国就业人数再创新高
item.description: 德国统计局周四表示，2024 年德国年均就业人数约为 4610 万人，是德国统一以来的最高值。【原文：There were roughly 46.1 million people employed in Germany in 2024 on an annual average, the highest number since German reunification, the statistics office said on Thursday.】

item.title: 收购沃达丰意大利公司完成后，瑞士电信下调盈利展望
item.description: 瑞士电信（Swisscom）周四表示，它已完成对竞争对手沃达丰意大利公司（Vodafone Italia）的收购，现在将开始与其意大利业务 Fastweb 合并。【原文：Swisscom said on Thursday that it has completed its acquisition of competitor Vodafone Italia, which it will now begin merging with its Italian business Fastweb.】

item.title: 竞争加剧，苹果在中国提供 iPhone 折扣优惠
item.description: 美国科技巨头苹果公司正在中国为其最新款 iPhone 提供高达 500 元人民币（68.50 美元）的罕见折扣，以抵御华为等国内竞争对手日益激烈的竞争。【原文：Apple is offering rare discounts of up to 500 yuan ($68.50) on its latest iPhone models in China, as the U.S. tech giant moves to defend its market share against rising competition from domestic rivals like Huawei.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场在特朗普的恐惧中迎来 2025 年
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 马来西亚根据新法律向微信和 TikTok 发放运营许可证
item.description: 马来西亚通信监管机构表示，已根据新的社交媒体法向腾讯的微信和字节跳动的 TikTok 发放了运营许可，但其他一些平台尚未提出申请。【原文：Malaysia's communications regulator said it granted Tencent's WeChat and ByteDance's TikTok licences to operate in the country under a new social media law, but that some other platforms had not applied.】

item.title: 特朗普 2.0 风险加剧，亚洲工厂 2024 年年底处境艰难
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次担任总统带来的贸易风险不断增加，加上中国需求持续疲软，人们对新一年的预期也随之下降，亚洲的工厂强国在2024年结束时表现疲软。【原文：Asia's factory powerhouses ended 2024 on a soft note as expectations for the new year soured amid growing trade risks from a second Donald Trump presidency and persistently weak Chinese demand.】

item.title: 2025年亚洲股市开局不顺，特朗普政策成焦点
item.description: 亚洲股市周四开盘表现低迷，在2024年收官之战中表现乏力，美元走高，在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫之前，投资者情绪保持谨慎。【原文：Asian stocks began the year on a dour note on Thursday as they struggled for traction after a jittery close to 2024, while the U.S. dollar charged higher and investor sentiment stayed cautious ahead of Donald Trump's return to the White House.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示中国工厂活动增长放缓
item.description: 周四的一项私营部门调查显示，中国 12 月份工厂活动有所增长，但增速低于预期，原因是对贸易前景的担忧导致出口订单减少，从而抑制了整体销售。【原文：China's factory activity grew in December but at a slower-than-expected pace, as overall sales were dampened by falling export orders amid concerns over the trade outlook, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 2025 年伊始，美元走高；日元触及五个月低点
item.description: 美元兑大多数货币在经历了一年的强劲涨势后，于周四在2025年伊始开始走强，日元汇率跌至五个多月来的最低水平，原因是投资者考虑到美国利率将在更长时间内继续走高。【原文：The U.S. dollar kicked off 2025 on the front foot on Thursday after a strong year of gain against most currencies, with the yen sliding toward its lowest level in more than five months as investors ponder U.S. interest rates staying higher for longer.】

item.title: 投资者假期归来，关注中国经济复苏，石油上涨
item.description: 周四是 2025 年的第一个交易日，油价略微走高，原因是在国家主席习近平承诺促进经济增长后，从假期归来的投资者谨慎地期待着中国经济和燃料需求的复苏。【原文：Oil prices nudged higher on Thursday, the first day of trade for 2025, as investors returning from holidays cautiously eyed a recovery in China's economy and fuel demand following a pledge by President Xi Jinping to promote growth.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长称今年将灵活放宽货币政策
item.description: 韩国央行行长周四表示，由于政治和经济不确定性加剧，今年放松货币政策的步伐需要灵活。【原文：South Korea's central bank governor said on Thursday the pace of monetary policy easing would need to be flexible this year due to heightened political and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 韩国 12 月工厂活动萎缩，企业转趋悲观，PMI 显示
item.description: 一项私营部门调查周四显示，由于美国贸易政策和国内政治的不确定性，韩国12月份工厂活动萎缩，制造商情绪自2020年中期以来首次转为悲观。【原文：South Korea's factory activity contracted in December, with manufacturers' sentiment turning pessimistic for the first time since mid-2020 due to uncertainty over U.S. trade policy and domestic politics, a private sector survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 华盛顿邮报》报道：美国财政部制裁办公室遭中国政府黑客攻击
item.description: 华盛顿邮报》周三援引未具名官员的话报道称，美国财政部制裁办公室遭到了中国政府的黑客攻击。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department's sanctions office was hacked by the Chinese government, the Washington Post reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed officials.】

item.title: 马斯克称特斯拉正在调查拉斯维加斯 Cybertruck 起火事件
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在 X 上发文称，"整个特斯拉高级团队 "正在调查周三在拉斯维加斯特朗普酒店外发生的 Cybertruck 起火事件。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said in a post on X that a fire in a Cybertruck outside the Trump Hotel in Las Vegas on Wednesday is being investigated by "the whole Tesla senior team."】

item.title: 2024 年即将结束，澳大利亚房价最终降温
item.description: 12 月份，澳大利亚房价出现了近两年来的首次月度下降，原因是高抵押贷款利率使人们的负担能力捉襟见肘，而且在长期上涨之后出现了更多的卖家。【原文：Australia's home prices marked the first monthly decline in almost two years in December as high mortgage rates stretched affordability and more sellers emerged after a long run of gains.】

item.title: 中国阿里巴巴以 16 亿美元向 DCP 出售尚艺集团股份
item.description: 中国阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司周三表示，已同意以122.98亿港元（15.8亿美元）的价格将其持有的连锁大卖场新艺城零售集团的多数股权出售给中国私募股权公司DCP Capital。【原文：China's Alibaba Group Holding Ltd said on Wednesday it had agreed to sell its majority stake in hypermarket chain Sun Art Retail Group to Chinese private equity firm DCP Capital for HK$12.298 billion ($1.58 billion).】

item.title: 2024 年澳门赌场收入高于官方预期，但低于疫情前水平
item.description: 澳门是世界上最大的赌博中心，其赌场收入在 2024 年飙升了近四分之一，但仍低于大流行前的水平，这凸显了这个前葡萄牙殖民地实现经济多元化的必要性。【原文：Casino revenues in Macau, the world's biggest gambling hub, soared by nearly a quarter in 2024 but still came in short of pre-pandemic levels, underlining the need for the former Portuguese colony to diversify its economy.】

item.title: 俄罗斯停止经乌克兰向欧洲出口天然气
item.description: 俄罗斯能源巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）周三表示，由于过境协议已经到期，从莫斯科时间8:00（格林尼治标准时间5:00）起停止经乌克兰向欧洲出口天然气。【原文：Russia's energy giant Gazprom said on Wednesday that gas exports via Ukraine to Europe had been halted from 08:00 Moscow time (0500 GMT) as the transit deal has expired.】

item.title: 花旗集团与美国贷款机构一道退出净零银行业务联盟
item.description: 美国花旗集团周二表示，它将退出净零银行联盟（NZBA）。【原文：U.S. bank Citigroup said on Tuesday it is exiting the Net-Zero Banking Alliance (NZBA), a group of global banks that have pledged to curb greenhouse gas emissions.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索兑美元创 16 年来最大年度跌幅
item.description: 墨西哥比索今年以来贬值近 23%，周二最后一个交易日的收盘价为 1 美元兑 20.82 比索，这是自 2008 年全球金融危机以来墨西哥比索兑美元的最大跌幅。【原文：Mexico's peso weakened nearly 23% this year to close the final day of trading at 20.82 pesos per U.S. dollar on Tuesday, the currency's deepest drop against the greenback since the 2008 global financial crisis.】

item.title: 华邮》报道：新日铁向美国政府提供否决权，以争取美国钢铁公司的批准
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周二报道，日本新日铁公司已提议给予美国政府对美国钢铁公司任何可能的产能削减的否决权，作为其争取美国总统乔-拜登批准收购美国钢铁公司努力的一部分。【原文：Japan's Nippon Steel has proposed giving the U.S. government veto power over any potential cuts to U.S. Steel's production capacity, as part of its efforts to secure President Joe Biden's approval for acquiring the American steelmaker, the Washington Post reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国将于本周发布氢能信用规则，为核电开辟道路
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，美国财政部打算在本周晚些时候发布指南，说明如何根据《2022 年通货膨胀削减法案》获得氢气生产税收抵免。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department intends to release guidance on how to access tax credits for hydrogen production under the 2022 Inflation Reduction Act later this week, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波音公司有望成为 2024 年道琼斯指数的最大输家
item.description: 美国飞机制造商波音公司有望成为 2024 年道琼斯指数的最大输家，由于它从一个危机跳到另一个危机，股价暴跌了 32%。【原文：U.S. planemaker Boeing is on track to be the biggest loser of 2024 in the Dow Jones Index, tumbling 32% as it bounced from one crisis to another.】
